"Searching for Establishments? You can browse for Restaurants, Resorts, Dental Clinics, Internet Cafes, Spas and Salons in the Home Page of the Application. You can easily narrow your search using the nearby feature to find establishments near you. You can find in those features available listings with the amenities and facilities you want. Read the listings for more details and pinpoint them on the map to check if they'd be a good fit for your leisure."

"Pakigsa-Bot is a community where anyone can belong. To ensure this, we're asking you to commit to the following: Pakigsa-Bot Community Commitment - I agree to treat everyone in the Pakigsa-Bot Community regardless of their race, religion, national origin, ethnicity, skin color, disability, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, or age - with respect, and without judgment or bias."

Hi, thanks for contacting us. Please send us any questions you may have. We aren\'t here at the moment, but we\'ll get back to you soon! We\'ve received your message and appreciate you reaching out. For faster communication, you have to inquire between 8AM - 6PM. You can also reach us at 032-412-3277 (Telephone) or 0922-643-6559 (Mobile) for faster transaction.
I also believe you might find the answer in our Home Menu. Just tap below to go to the Main Menu
Sorry I didn\'t understand you. Simple add @help to your message and we will try to answer you as soon as possible. Is there anything else I can help you with?

The Premium membership will automatically be set and will remain for as long as you pay the monthly subscription fee. Pakigsa-Bot reserves the right to add, modify, reduce, or discontinue the membership or benefits associated with Premium membership if you have 3 unattended confirmed reservations, violated the Pakigsa-Bot Community Guidelines or at any time. You agree and acknowledge that Pakigsa-Bot has the right to immediately terminate such membership if it discovers that you have been in violation of the above paragraph at any time during your membership, and, at Pakigsa-Bot’s discretion, Pakigsa-Bot may take action against you, including, but not limited to, suspending or removing your account from the Application indefinitely.

Your Premium Membership, and privileges may be revoked at any time if you violate these terms, the Pakigsa-Bot Terms of Service or any other Pakigsa-Bot terms and conditions applicable to you. Continued participation in the membership is at Pakigsa-Bot’s sole and final discretion. The subscription fee is not refundable and will not be refunded if for anytime you wish to discontinue acquiring the Premium Subscription.

If you choose to use the Pakigsa-Bot Application, you do so voluntarily and at your sole risk. The Pakigsa-Bot Application, and Premium membership and any other materials or benefits, are provided “as is”, without warranty of any kind, either express or implied. You agree that you have had whatever opportunity you deem necessary to investigate the Pakigsa-Bot Services, laws, rules, or regulations. The foregoing disclaimers apply to the maximum extent permitted by law. You may have other statutory rights. However, the duration of statutorily required warranties, if any, shall be limited to the maximum extent permitted by law.
